Detailed Description

Implementation of a render-only GLSL draw style used internally.

Member Function Documentation

void DzDefaultStyle::setLight ( DzLight *  light  )  [slot]

Sets the light for the immediate draw action, this changes the shader that is used by the style, so call this before requesting the shader to get the correct shader.

Parameters:
The light for the drawing action.
DzSceneShader * DzDefaultStyle::shader (  )  const [virtual]
Returns:
The shader for the draw style.

Reimplemented from DzDrawStyle.

bool DzDefaultStyle::shadersValid (  )  [slot]

Returns true if all three light shaders are valid, otherwise returns false.
